edu.cmu.cs.ark.sage.features

Class IndexedFeatureVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • gnu.trove.impl.hash.THash
      • gnu.trove.impl.hash.TPrimitiveHash
        • gnu.trove.impl.hash.TIntDoubleHash
          • gnu.trove.map.hash.TIntDoubleHashMap
            • edu.cmu.cs.ark.sage.features.IndexedFeatureVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TIntDoubleMap, Externalizable, Serializable

    public class IndexedFeatureVector
extends TIntDoubleHashMap
    Similar to FeatureVector by indexed by ints instead. Its based on TIntDoubleHashMap so it is fast.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Yanchuan Sim
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Increment the value of a particular feature in the vector.

        value - Amount to increment by (or decrement if negative).
